title: Desire and Duty
description: Set in a fantasy world, Desire and Duty is the first erotic romance in The Consort’s Chronicles series.The Emperor of Kienia is expecting his wife to provide him with a son. After twelve months of waiting, he’s growing impatient and Lenora realises her life may be forfeit if she can’t make good on her purpose. What follows is a tale of passion, intrigue, and sexual awakening.In a world dominated by men, where a woman has only her body and her wits to rely on, Lenora will risk everything to protect her position and survive.Please note this story contains m/m scenes, adultery, and some non-consensual elements.
author: E.C. Jarvis
